roleset.name: boing boing boing,
roleset.note: BOUNCE-V NOTES: I find this a very odd usage. (from bounce.01-v)
BOUNCE-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from bounce.01-n)

example.name: bounce-v: stock report
example.text: [Cable& Wireless]-1 benefited from a market squeeze, *trace*-1 bouncing 13 to 498 in moderately active volume.

example.name: bounce-v: with agent
example.text: The Senate will bounce bills back to the House.

example.name: bounce-n
example.text: Rosetta imaged Philae during its descent -- and after its bounce.

roleset.name: recover
roleset.note: BOUNCE_BACK-V NOTES: No corresponding VN class for the verb particle construction. (from bounce.02-v)

example.name: recovery
example.text: But Coleco bounced back with the introduction of the Cabbage Patch dolls, whose sales hit $600 million in 1985.
example.arg: with the introduction of the Cabbage Patch dolls, whose sales hit $600 million in 1985
